answers.answer: My sister in law had preeclampsia. She now has a perfectly healthy one year old.don't worry too much.
Awe:( good luck, keep us updated! I hope everything goes well!!

As long as they're monitoring you I wouldn't stress! My sister had full blown eclampsia with her first and had two seizures after. With her second she had pre-eclampsia and ended up doing an emergency c section(even though she had one scheduled already), and since they watched her she had no problems! If you're being watched I wouldn't worry too much! My doctor is monitoring me for it because at 20 weeks my blood pressure had started rising. I'm only 25 weeks, so hoping it stays low enough they don't put me on bed rest!

That's what im dealing with now. Non stress test and ultrasounds nurses coming to my house and I also have a machine installed at my house. The doctors will do all they can to make sure you and your baby is safe

question: Im being told to go into l&d because i possibly have preeclampsia because of a severe headach and im having a little swelling in my hands
title: possible preeclampsia
